attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Armenian Genocide of 1915 is not recognised in the UK. We believe that the British government should acknowledge these atrocities as a "genocide" and put pressure on the Turkish government to do the same. 

In justification of the Holocaust, Hitler reportedly said; "Who, after all, speaks to-day of the annihilation of the Armenians?" 

To stop evil, first you must recognise it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
